item.description:
All,

FYI, We will still be playing in the rain.

Administrative:
We'll be changing the time back to 2pm this week. Since the sun is setting much earlier, clocks will be moving back soon, and there is no planned athletic event we will try to stick with this time. Let me know if this will be a bad time for you, looking ahead.

Information:
All are welcome to join us play flag-football. Skill level does not matter, but a good attitude does. Please come ready to have fun. Hope to see you there.

Logistics:
From the redline 'T' - Get off at the Alewife station, follow signs to Rindge Ave., then look for the stadium lights, grandstands, and turf field. This is where Russell Field is located.

-Frank
item.how_to_find_us: Ex: I'll be the guy in the back with a Meetup t-shirt
item.name: 2PM - SAT - FLAG FOOTBALL - RUSSELL FIELD
